name: CL_RMT_SVC_QTY_INF
description: This table contains the service line quantity information for a remittance record.

columns.name: IMAGE_ID
columns.description: This is the ID for the remittance image record with related remit claim references.

columns.name: QTY_SVC_LN
columns.description: This is the service line quantity information.

columns.name: SVC_QTY_QUAL_C_NAME
columns.description: This is the service line level quantity qualifier.
entries: Federal medicare or medicaid payment mandate category 1
Federal medicare or medicaid payment mandate category 2
Federal medicare or medicaid payment mandate category 3
Federal medicare or medicaid payment mandate category 4
Federal medicare or medicaid payment mandate category 5

columns.name: SVC_QTY
columns.description: This is the service level quantity.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record. (Standard for this column type)
